name: Wyld Ynycyrns
description:
Wyld Ynycyrns

1/ Rock the aliens that want to terminate your musical career
2/ For each section you need to rock a certain amount of aliens to progress on the level/song
3/ Swap between musicians whenever the mojo is about to run out

Keys
1 2 3 4 5  / Select musician
Arrows / Move beam
Escape / Pause
A + D W + S / Change musician
H / Help 

To-Do
- Consolidate existing and add More Aliens, More Levels, More Tunes!
- End level Bosses (and mini Bosses throughout)

- Difficulty Levels *Easy/Medium/Hard/Mozart
- Leaderboards
- UI Improvements
- In Game Options Menu
- Multiplayer / Co/OP

Known Bugs/Special Features
- Hello, console!
- Ynycyrns vs Unycyrns, aaarrrggghhhh!

Credits
NotARaptor / Coding
trapuh / GFX + Audio
Assets from flaticon.com were used (instrument icons).

Disclaimer
No crowd elements were harmed during the production of this game and the mosh pit was always under patrol by the local police to ensure the EU and EEUU safety rules for a safe work environment were respected.
